entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
